input_email_body:
Subject: Project Syncing Issues Across Various Tools

Hello support team, I am encountering difficulties with project synchronization. The data is not being updated consistently across my tools, which might be related to an API integration problem You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Despite restarting the services and reviewing the logs, the issue remains unresolved My name is David Kim.. Could you please assist me in addressing this problem at your earliest convenience?
